name: node-red-node-feedparser
description: A Node-RED node to get RSS Atom feeds.
readme: node-red-node-feedparser ======================== A Node-RED node to read RSS and Atom feeds. **Note** : This is the same node as was in the core of Node-RED. As of v0.10.8 it will be installed from here instead. Install ------- Run the following command in the user directory of your Node-RED install. By default this is `.node-red` npm install node-red-node-feedparser Usage ----- Provides two nodes - one to receive messages, and one to send. ###Input Monitors an RSS/atom feed for new entries. You can set the polling time in minutes. Defaults to 15 minutes.
